api_data.job_title: NON SALES PROFILE INTO INDUSTRIAL TRAINING FOR MUMBAI LOCATION

jd_information.description: A Leading Institute in Training needs Business Consultant for Mumbai- Andheri Location.  ITS A NON - SALES PROFILE / NO DIRECT SELLING PROFILE: The Business Consultant Has to : 1> Help The Organisation to Tie up with Leading Industrial Houses for Training. 2> Has to generate a Team of Growth Partners. 3> Motivate & Train the Team of Growth Partners to help generate leads for Industry. CTC: 4 To 6 Lac + incentives HOW TO APPLY: Interested candidates can Submit CV at : www.seacareers.in OR Mail CV at : ajay@seacareers.in & seacareers@yahoo.com OR Call Ajay @ 98889-101-98
